thread.title: Hamburg’s Brazilian international midfielder Walace wanted by Everton and Leicester City
thread.title_full: Hamburg’s Brazilian international midfielder Walace wanted by Everton and Leicester City

author: fnathan
title: Hamburg’s Brazilian international midfielder Walace wanted by Everton and Leicester City
text:
Comments HAMBURG’S Brazilian international Walace is wanted by Premier League duo Everton and Leicester City. 
The Bundesliga strugglers only signed the defensive midfielder from Gremio for £8million in the January window – but has impressed in his limited appearance time so far. Getty Images 3 Walace is wanted by Everton and Leicester City 
Keep up to date with ALL the Premier League news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Hamburg battled to sign him in the first place and are already bracing themselves for summer offers from England for the powerhouse. 
He started off his time in Germany in the best possible fasion, markeing his Hamburg league debut with a goal against high-flying RB Leipzig last week. Reuters The defensive midfielder scored on his league debut for Hamburg last month related stories Fight club Alexis Sanchez set to quit Arsenal in the summer following dressing room bust up after Bayern Munich defeat Ars out? Under-fire Arsene Wenger finally admits he could leave Arsenal THIS season as he faces decision over future JESUS UNDER KNIFE Gabriel Jesus has surgery in Barcelona to repair fractured metatarsal and faces eight weeks out GUNNING FOR THE JOB Odds and info on Allegri, Tuchel and all the other contenders being lined up to replace Arsene Wenger gunner go Arsenal draw up shortlist of replacements for Arsene Wenger who could announce future in March MAKE YOUR MIND UP Arsene Wenger must decide his Arsenal future immediately for the good of the club, says Jens Lehmann i'M JUR MAN Chelsea wonderkid Dominic Solanke is ready to join Liverpool in a stunning summer switch CLATT'S CHINA SNUB Mark Clattenburg turned down £1m-a-year offer from China before quitting Prem for Saudi Arabia RED AND BLUE ALERT Manchester City to ramp up security by making Etihad BOMBPROOF over fears of terrors attack MASS EXODUS Arsenal should force a number of Arsenal players out of the Emirates door... along with Arsene Wenger comeback trail Andy Carroll and Diafra Sakho fly to Dubai with West Ham squad to help recoveries from injuries saint MARTIN Southampton swoop to sign former Juventus defender Martin Caceres as he turns down Barcelona 
Champions Leicester, along with Italian side Lazio were one of the clubs who nearly signed the gold medal winner from the Rio Olympics. 
But with the Foxes’ Premier League survival hanging in the balance, boss Claudio Ranieri may wait and see how the rest of the season progresses, report the Mirror . Getty Images 3 He played a key role in Brazil winning team football gold at the Rio Olympics last summer 
And 21-year-old Walace, who has won two senior caps to date, is also in Everton boss Ronald Koeman’s sights.
